column1: The Purple Pig////We went around 945 on a Saturday. I'm used to DC and NY where places are open late. We had a party of 4 and were told that we might not even get seated since they close at 11pm on a Saturday night (like what is that..?). Anyways we got seated in about 40 minutes. Rushed to put in some orders. Cocktails were okay. We got 8 plates between the 4 of us which was enough food. From what I remember:
